title: Cilantro Vinaigrette
ingredients: - Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
- ¼ cup plus 2 tablespoons canola oil
directions: Combine the vinegar, mustard, honey, and 2 tablespoons of cold water in a blender, season with salt and pepper, and blend until smooth. Add the cilantro and blend until incorporated. With the motor running, slowly add the oil and blend until emulsified. This can be made up to 8 hours in advance and refrigerated. Bring to room temperature before serving.
